main event: A sighting of a greenish blue flame changing to white, observed in the sky and initially thought to be a meteor.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10 seconds while the observer was in the Collins, Missouri area., The object was described as being the size of a volleyball., The witness caught a metallic glint out of the corner of their eye., The report documents suggest that the trajectory and speed matched that of a meteor., The sighting was recorded on a Project Blue Book document, which reflects government interest in unidentified flying objects.
witness description: Halsbrook Master Sargent USAF Reserve, 442nd Troop Carrier Wing
